#summary List of available use cases.
#labels Phase-Requirements,Featured

= Visitor Use Cases =
 * [UC1_PictureSubmission]: Submitting a picture to Photo Hunt via email.
 * [UC2_PictureViewing]: Viewing the approved pictures using the web application.

= Reviewer Use Cases =
 * [UC3_PictureReview]: Reviewing submitted pictures and approving them for display.
 * [UC4_CreateGame]: Creating a new Photo Hunt scavenger hunt game
 * [UC5_EditGame]: Edit or delete an existing Photo Hunt scavenger hunt game
 * [UC6_EditAccountSettings]: Changing account settings such as the account password.
 * [UC7_LogOut]: Log out of an active session
